import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; const About = () => { const skills = [ { name: 'Python', level: 95 }, { name: 'Machine Learning', level: 90 }, { name: 'Mathematical Modeling', level: 92 }, { name: 'Quantitative Finance', level: 88 }, { name: 'Data Analysis', level: 90 }, { name: 'PyTorch/TensorFlow', level: 85 } ]; return (

About Me

Computational mathematician with a passion for innovation

{ e.target.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/667eea/ffffff?text=Siddhant+Sukhani'; }} />

Stanford Graduate Student & Research Enthusiast

I'm currently pursuing my Masters of Science in Computational Mathematical Engineering with a focus on Mathematical Computational Finance at Stanford University. My academic journey began at Georgia Institute of Technology, where I earned my Bachelor's in Applied Mathematics and Computational Data Analysis with a stellar 3.97 CGPA.

My expertise spans machine learning, quantitative finance, and mathematical modeling. I've contributed to cutting-edge research in NLP, financial modeling, and developed novel approaches to problems in language modeling and differential equations. I'm passionate about bridging the gap between theoretical mathematics and practical applications.

Skills & Technologies

{skills.map((skill, index) => (
{skill.name} {skill.level}%
))}
); }; export default About;
